segments.advisor_message: So, to get started with your dependents, can you share their names with me?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, yeah, I have, like, a daughter and a son... their names are, uh, Lucy and Paul, I think?

segments.advisor_message: Great, thanks! And when were they born? Could you provide their dates of birth?
segments.client_message: Yeah, Lucy was born, uh, in April, I think... the 15th, um, 2015? And Paul, uh, he was born in, oh, I forget, but it's, like, December something... um, uh, 2017?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Now, for the last thing, could you tell me how long they'll be your dependents? Any specific dates?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! Uh, I think Lucy will be a dependent until, um, maybe the end of next year or something? And Paul, oh, uh, I’m not sure, maybe when he's, like, 18?
